title: No rate limiting - Create data

profile.name: Stripo Inc
profile.about: Stripo is a lightweight and intuitive email template editor that lets users build professional looking and highly responsive email templates.

vulnerability_information:
## Summary:

Hello team Stripo, how are you?

I found a rate limit for data creation.

Target = https://my.stripo.email/cabinet/#/my-services/298427?tab=data-sources
